医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究人员发现多巴胺在调节tau功能中的保护作用北京大学化学与分子工程学院的王楚教授领导的研究小组发表了一篇研究文章，名为“定量化学蛋白质组学揭示了多巴胺对自然化学生物学的保护性修饰”（DOI：10.1038/S41589-025-025-025-01849-9）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/researchers-uncover-protection-role-fopamine-dopamine-in-in-in-in-in-in-in-in-in-in-in-in-indeculating-tau-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/researchers-uncover-protection-protection-role-of-dopamine-in-in-in-indregulating-tau-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B710C126-B62F-4F1E-A935-5F3FB71456D6 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 21:00:57 -0400 Researchers uncover protective role of dopamine in regulating tau function
研究为糖饮料对人类健康的有害影响提供了新的见解塔塔塔塔基础研究所（TIFR，孟买和海德拉巴TIFR）的高级新陈代谢，发展与衰老研究部（ARUMDA）的研究人员全面了解了对人类健康的模型，对人类健康的模型对人类健康的模型进行了对人类健康的有害影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/study-ctudy-new-inew-insights-into-the-the-harmful-effects-sugar-sugar-sweetened-sweetened-sweetened-beverages-beverages-beverages-beverages-beverages-beverages-beverages-nhealth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/study-ctudy-ctudy-new-inew-insights-into-the-the-harmful-effects-of-sugar-sugar-sweetenced-bernecenend-sweetened-beverages-beverages-beverages-beverages-beverages-human-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2A5243E-D196-487F-BBE6-0C07EEEFAB153 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 20:56:42 -0400 Study offers new insights into the harmful effects of sugar-sweetened beverages on human health
耐药细菌演变为武器化抗菌遗传工具在过去的几年中，一种适合医疗保健环境的抗药性细菌类型，用于武器化抗菌遗传工具，消除其表亲并代替它们作为主导菌株。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/drug-esistant-bacteria-evolve-to-weaponize-an-an-an-antimicrobial-genetic-genetic-genetic-tool.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/drug-esistant-bacteria-evolve-to-weaponize-an-an-an-antimicrobial-genetic-genetic-genetic-tool.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62B60822-1B8D-444E-9562-9B98B1B23D29 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 20:45:50 -0400 Drug-resistant bacteria evolve to weaponize an antimicrobial genetic tool
近一半的抑郁症患者因治疗抗药性而挣扎由于新研究表明，几乎一半被诊断出患有抑郁症的患者被归类为“耐药性”，这表明许多人对多种抗抑郁剂的选择没有反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/nearly-half-of-patients-with-depression-with-depression-trugger-with-with-withment-treatment-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/nearly-half-of-patients-with-depression-with-depression-truggh-with-with-withment-wartment-reatment-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ffc8674-7ba1-4163-a512-6639a7659989 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 20:41:00 -0400 Nearly half of depression patients struggle with treatment resistance
研究发现证据表明婴儿可以在早期编码记忆尽管我们在生命的第一年中学到了很多东西，但我们不能作为成年人记住那个时候的特定事件。长期以来，研究人员一直认为我们不坚持这些经验，因为负责保存记忆的大脑部分 - 海马 - 在青春期发展仍在良好发展，而在我们最早的几年中，人们无法编码记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/Research-finds-evidence-that-in-th--in--in--in-can-can-can-can-encode-memories-in-early-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/research-finds-vinds-vinds-that-in-th--in-infants-can-encode-memories-in-early-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B44492245-497E-4C38-8FD5-B7E52AC36D87 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 20:29:54 -0400 Research finds evidence that infants can encode memories in early life
研究表明，外国援助制裁对孕产妇和儿童健康的影响根据斯坦福大学领导的一项新的研究，官方发展援助的减少会导致母亲，儿童和婴儿的死亡大幅增加，该研究审查了对外国援助的三十年制裁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/study-shows-impact-foreign-foreign-foreign-aid-sanctions-on-maternal-and-maternal-and-child-health-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/study-shows-impact-foreign-foreign-foreign-aid-sanctions-on-maternal-and-maternal-and-child-health-child-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91983A99-7B38-4CA8-4CA8-8256-5922CBC0D19C Fri, 21 Mar 2025 20:15:24 -0400 Study shows impact of foreign aid sanctions on maternal and child health
第一分子电影在原子层捕获DNA解压缩莱斯特大学的科学家捕获了第一部详细的“分子电影”，显示DNA在原子水平上被解压缩 - 揭示了细胞如何开始复制其遗传物质的关键过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/first-molecular-movie-captures-dna-unzipping-at-at-Atomic-level.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/first-molecular-movie-captures-dna-unzipping-at-at-atomic-level.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=Ad695260-8c45-4999-A465-6610CE7241B0 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 20:08:00 -0400 First molecular movie captures DNA unzipping at atomic level
250,000个全基因组对AGD倡议进行了测序，以提高药物发现纳什维尔Biosciences LLC（NASHBIO）是一家领先的临床和基因组数据公司，范德比尔特大学医学中心的全资子公司，以及全球DNA测序巨头Illumina Inc.今天宣布，已对25万个基因组进行了序列，用于基因组发现联盟（AGD）的启动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/250000-whole-genomes-sequest-for-agd-initiative-to-initiative-to-advance-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/250000-whole-genomes-sequest-for-for-agd-initiative-to-anitiative-to-advance-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd626b9c-408d-42b6-875e-18d08888888b257c Fri, 21 Mar 2025 20:05:41 -0400 250,000 whole genomes sequenced for AGD initiative to advance drug discovery
在达芙妮pseudomezereum中鉴定的抗HIV活性二萜类化合物由Toho University的药学学系Wei Li教授领导的研究小组与美国杜克大学医学中心合作，首次发现Daphne pseudomezereum（通常称为Onishibari）的研究小组包含一种抑制人体免疫功能的物质（HOTIVER）的药物（通常称为Onishibari）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/anti-hiv-active-diterpenoids-indiondified-in-daphne-in-daphne-pseudomezereum.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/anti-hiv-active-diterpenoids-indiendified-in-daphne-daphne-pseudomezereum.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=958A4E13-B88F-49B1-92A3-FE6C8CCA0F3C Fri, 21 Mar 2025 20:00:54 -0400 Anti-HIV active diterpenoids identified in Daphne pseudomezereum
昼夜节律在调节肿瘤进展中起着至关重要的作用昼夜节律是内源性的时间保存机制，可响应外部光黑暗周期来调节生理过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/circadian-rhythms-play-a-clay-a-cucial-role----------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/circadian-rhythms-play-play-a-cucial-role--------------------------- in-in-in-in-in-in-indumorating-tumor-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e39c3335a-ec10-4966-AD60-FB42B73ED9FA Fri, 21 Mar 2025 19:54:21 -0400 Circadian rhythms play a crucial role of in regulating tumor progression
